summary: ArbiLearn is a Web3 education platform that integrates gamified learning with financial incentives, aiming to make blockchain education engaging and accessible, particularly in emerging markets. The project proposes a "learn and earn" model, where users are rewarded with crypto for completing courses. It also features NFT membership for exclusive access and a unique peeping system for exploring blockchain ecosystems. The grant will be used to expand the platform, develop new courses, and enhance community engagement.
review: ArbiLearn presents a compelling case for enhancing Web3 education through gamification and financial incentives. The project aligns well with the round's focus on open-source dApps and apps that enhance Web3 accessibility and usability. The use of NFTs for membership and the integration of a peeping system are innovative features that differentiate ArbiLearn from traditional learning platforms. However, the application lacks detailed evidence of measurable outcomes and a clear sustainability model, which are critical according to the model specification. The project is ambitious in its goals to onboard users from emerging markets, but it needs to provide more concrete data on its current impact and future scalability plans. Additionally, while the project emphasizes community engagement, it should outline more robust governance structures to ensure equitable participation and decision-making.

strengths.title: Innovative Learning Model
strengths.description: ArbiLearn's 'learn and earn' model is a unique approach that combines education with financial incentives, making learning more engaging and rewarding.

strengths.title: Focus on Emerging Markets
strengths.description: The project targets underserved regions, particularly in Africa, aiming to lower barriers to Web3 adoption.

strengths.title: Community Engagement
strengths.description: ArbiLearn fosters a decentralized learning community, encouraging participation and collaboration through social platforms and governance features.

weaknesses.title: Lack of Measurable Outcomes
weaknesses.description: The application does not provide sufficient data or metrics to demonstrate the project's impact or success in achieving its educational goals.

weaknesses.title: Unclear Sustainability Model
weaknesses.description: There is a lack of clarity on how the project plans to sustain itself financially beyond the initial grant funding.

changes.title: Provide Measurable Outcomes
changes.description: Include specific metrics and data to demonstrate the project's impact and success in achieving its educational goals.

changes.title: Clarify Sustainability Plan
changes.description: Outline a clear plan for financial sustainability, detailing how the project will continue to operate and grow beyond the initial grant funding.
